title: Development of AR-Based Elementary Physical Education Instructional Design Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Physical Education Methodologies, Basic Understanding of Augmented Reality (AR) Technology, and Foundational Knowledge of the TPACK Framework
context.additional_context: Program for language education specialists in vocational training institutions, aiming to enhance instructional design competencies for applying AR technology in elementary physical education

learning_goals: Design AR-based physical education lesson plans using an integrated TAM-TPACK framework
Establish instructional strategies connecting educational objectives with technological functions through technology acceptance analysis (PU/PEU/BI)
Develop feedback tools to evaluate the integration of AR content with curricula in VR simulation environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
